abstract: In the battle between Apple and Microsoft, two men are in charge of competing efforts to ensure that the PC’s basic software stays relevant in a Web-centered world.
snippet: In the battle between Apple and Microsoft, two men are in charge of competing efforts to ensure that the PC’s basic software stays relevant in a Web-centered world.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, June 4 — Can two bitter rivals save the desktop operating system?

headline.main: Competing as Software Goes to Web
headline.print_headline: Competing As Software Goes to Web
